Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel - would stay there again”
Reviews.Author: TorontoTraveller37
Reviews.Content: location quick check elevators arrived quickly dated clean suitcase stands internet pretty slow weak signal free lot online didnt eat hotel lots restaurants dundas street west workout facility pretty simple treadmills crosstrainer free weights clean lots towels cold water change clean adjacent pool lots seating whirlpool underground parking lot pretty tight lit

Reviews.Content: day checked entire lobby smelled front desk mentioned backup elevator shaft yikes deluxe looked bad 80s movie decor dated worn cigarette burns carpet cracked toilet bathroom hadnt replaced advertise comp wifi sucker paying facilities fee btw ripoff ive stays motel 6 hole wall run hotel avoid dump plague

Reviews.Title: “Best Value for the Money in Downtown Toronto”
Reviews.Author: gwilliams
Reviews.Content: agree reviews hotel bit tired spruced value money downtown toronto deal local competition sheraton expensive addition charges internet service marriot usually expensive cheaper hotels cheap cost time queen bed comfortable 125 internet plus taxes sheraton 25 charges 19 night internet comparable parking charges dont drive downtown cant compare hotels hop skip city halls underground parking metropolitan closer dining including splurge chinese dining city
